name: CL_PAT_EDU_TITLE
description: Enterprise reporting table for patient education title and title status items.

columns.name: PED_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the patient education record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line count for the Patient education title data.

columns.name: PAT_TITLE_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the patient education title. It is stored in internal format and can be used to link to the teaching title (IED) master file.

columns.name: PAT_TITLE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: A category item that specifies each title's status.
